author: costin
msg: The 'memory' context - used to be the java:, but it can be used
for other things and as a generic context.

author: costin
msg: Refactored versions of what's in tomcat-5.
The 'cache' should be useable with other contexts ( in tomcat-5 there
are some hardcoded references to the filesystem context ).
What I tried to do is make sure the contexts work as plain ant
tasks - so in future it should be possible to access and manipulate
.war and config files with just ant and the naming jars.
